introduction: SYNOPSISA young girl from a poor family is sold to an inn. When lord Hong is weakened by his young second wife, his doctor, Doh decides to adhere to the Maiden Scriptures handed down from China. According to the Maiden Scriptures, Hong needed a rejuvenator maiden. Doh schemes with the inn keeper to make the young girl a rejuvenator maiden despite protests from Ba-woo to whom the young girl promised herself to. But Ba-woo is also victimized. Hong's consummation with the young girl succeeds in rejuvenating him. Ba-woo and the young girl decide to run away after killing Hong's wife but are soon caught by Hong. Hong ends up killing the two.故事一个家庭的女孩可怜的女儿去了一家小客栈和销售。力量感弘大突然脚下一滑，由于年轻的第二任妻子的医生douiwon量动员根据“sonyeogyeong”的教导女仆复兴访问中国中国人手里的。Douiwon鲍尔被任命女孩和组建一个策划复兴小龙女弘大感，偶然遇到了一个女孩，并承诺未来是阻止他们。不过，他也成为尹曼达ssinaeri。毕竟男女交媾弘大有道理焕发青春了。女孩弓和杀死两名男子杀害妻子而弘大的意义，并决定逃往感应键弘大弘大的感觉逃脱。
